1123.content:
Being a princess had its perks, getting to eat all day, having access to the most exclusive resorts, and luxurious recliners. But the title also brought requirements, especially the Sweetsburg princess. Female Sweetsburg royalty was expected to be obese, viewing women as signs of wealth and beauty with the mentality of the fatter the better. Taking immense pride in their countries' lucrative farm goods, women kept themselves very well fed, their proud bodies displaying the country's success.

The royal ladies were rather portly, the queen was an impressive 450 pounds with 3 daughters. Two of them were nice and fat, however the eldest, Cindy was embarrashingly scrawny. Unlike her younger sisters Cindy had a fast metabolism which burned off all her hard earned calories. Cindy desparately yearned to be fat, stuffing herself day and night, consuming the highest calorie foods, and avoiding physical exertion. Despite the effort, Cindy remained a mere 120pounds managing to gain only a few pounds. Even her youngest sister weighed over 200 pounds being tens years younger than the 21 year old Cindy. Cindy's inferior size was too apparent to her concerned mother.

It was at dinner when Cindy's initiated an ultimatum to Cindy. The ladies were sitting around a massive table feasting upon rich decadant foods. "Cindy!" the queen addressed her eldest daughter who was scarfing down fried chicken. "We need to address the topic of your weight." Cindy grew nervous as her mother continued. "My dear you are simply too thin to be a Sweetsburg princess." "But mom I'm trying my best, see how much chicken I'm eating." Cindy stammered before getting cut off. "Cindy that thin body of yours is an embarassment. Your sisters are much fatter than you and would make much better queens than you. If you don't become obese you will be skipped over for the title." the queen sternly spoke. "B-but mother please, I'll gain weight just give me a chance!" pleaded the quivering princess. "Cindy, wit that fast metabolism of yours you won't be able to gain weight." the queen coldly said. "But can't we do something I mean we are the royal family." pleaded Cindy.

The queen smiled as she offered options.

Her grandma died a week earlier, and Alexis was sad about that, but was she was happy that she got to inherit her estate and servants. She was shocked when her mom told her the news about her grandma's death, but she was more shocked that she was to become princess! Alexis was riding in a limo to the castle. She was eating some brownies, candy bars, and cookies, she was also drinking a milkshake. She felt very full, but her mom said just to eat what they offer her, because it is the custom of NF. She looked at her younger sister, Ali. She was eating 4 platters of cookies, a massive cup of chocolate milk, and some cans of whipped cream which she sprayed into her own mouth and put on some of her cookies. In America, Ali never ate a ton, but in NF everything was different. "Mommy! [she paused to eat a cookie and spray whipped cream in her mouth] Look how much food their giving me! [burp]" Ali said with a mouth full of food. "That's nice dear, now eat your dessert." Ali nodded with glee as she shoved a cookie in her mouth. "Don't forget to eat you cotton candy!" Her mom said to Ali. "Hey mom, I finished my food, can I relax now?" Alexis asked. "No." Her mom pulled three cakes out. "You need to eat these to look your best at the castle!" Her mom said. Alexis sighed as she unbuttoned her jeans, realeasing her stuffed belly.

121111111.title: Invite the girls over

choices: The sisters go out and see the sights and look for bigger clothes.
The sisters learn more about their family and food.
1211112.content:
Although Alexis was always a big eater, not caring if she got fat from it, she was surprised her mother, Jane, and sister pretty much felt the same. She was also kind of overwhelmed at the vast amount of food her family was given, hoping it wasn't going to harm them. Since they were adjusting to it very well, though, Alexis just went along with it.

"Okay, but these treats are pretty filling," Alexis said, patting her fatter belly. Jane looked at her daughter's belly and laughed a little. "I can see that, dear." Alexis then walked into the dining room, seeing some entrees in front of her and a red-headed maid smiling at her. "Oh, well...uh..." Alexis was feeling very full after her arriving snacks, but she didn't want to disappoint her new servants and culture.

"Please, princess, have some dinner," the maid, Colette said, still smiling. Alexis shrugged and sat down, saying "I'll try and eat what I can, but I can't guarantee I'll finish it all." Colette responded, "I'm sure you can do it. You are part of the LaBelle family. LaBelle ladies have very big appetites: they start to show when they turn 8." (LaBelle is Jane's surname, kept after marriage. Alexis and Ali's father's name was Robert Fuller: he died four years ago. The girls full names: Alexis and Ali LaBelle-Fuller.)

Alexis rubbed her belly, not feeling full anymore, and things started making a little more sense to her. She remembered that her late grandmother Maura, like many grandmothers, encouraged her daughter and granddaughters to eat, but she gave lots of food even for those kinds of grandmothers. It especially helped explain why Alexis tended to get hungry soon after even big holiday meals. Ali also just turned 8, so she must be starting to get hungrier.

"Colette," Alexis asked, "Do LaBelle girls also get fat?" (Maura was somewhat large, but not particularly overweight in her old age. She was much heavier when she was younger.) Colette was only 19, but she was pretty well-versed in the LaBelle's history. "Yes, they are known to enjoy fattening themselves up. Sometimes, their friends also fatten up thanks to their influence. The family always held larger women as the pinnacle of beauty, ever since the 1700s. Most importantly, some 60 years ago, a group of females gathered under your grandmother and great aunt Caroline (also deceased, decided not to take the throne) as part of a dessert club. They shared their love of food and fattening, which spread through the area. It also ushered in a new era of beauty, as when the desserts started to spread, so did the weight, and the women of New France began to embrace this standard the LaBelles held so dear. This also helped the formation of a great economy and later, a monarchy. Your family basically made New France the haven for desserts and heavier women it is today."

Alexis was absent-mindedly eating as Colette regaled her with this history. She was quite fascinated with how her grandmother helped found an entire country. Ali had also walked in and heard the story, so she grabbed some cakes and started eating. "That sounds awesome! I want to get fat like those ladies, too!" Ali's LaBelle appetite had started to kick in and as she ate, her belly started growing. She popped another button on her skirt as a result of her feast and it eventually popped off. Alexis was also more willing to gain some weight now that she knew how her family created a nation based on it.

"In that case, I hope there's some pie waiting. I haven't had any in a good while," Alexis said. She and Ali both stuffed themselves quite well that evening, filling their bellies to their absolute limit, with Alexis splitting her jeans at the end. They spent that night patting their bellies in Alexis' room, completely content with their new life.

"Mmmmmm...." was the only thing the girls said as they lied on Alexis' bed together. Ali must have gained 5 pounds since they arrived, her face starting to show some fattening. Alexis was already chubby when she arrived, but her face was noticeably larger, too. Her hips also grew as evidenced by the hole in her jeans. She took them off afterwards, and both sisters were sitting with their white panties exposed as their mother walked in.

"So girls, how are you liking New France so far?" Jane asked her daughters, but the only responses she received were sighs of fullness. She didn't mind, though, because she knew they were happy here. "Good night, my little angels." Jane said little, but they'd be big angels soon enough.

One week later, the girls had started to become even fatter than before. Ali started to look rounder and her belly stuck out proudly wherever she went, and she liked to slap it every now and then to show her pride for her fat and family. Alexis was now overweight, but she enjoyed feeling much bigger and softer. She noticed her clothes had become very tight, though the castle didn't have any formal dress code and she could walk around in her underwear if she wanted, but Alexis preferred to have some newer clothes anyway. She noticed that Ali was also getting too fat for her clothes and asked her if she wanted to go shopping and maybe do some sightseeing. Ali said she was more interested in her family and all the food they made (Ali is a budding chef.), but they thought it over and eventually came to an agreement.
1211112.title: Alexis Has Dinner and a History Lesson

choices: The sisters hit the town and meet their subjects.
12111122.content:
"Alexis, my tummy's rumbling," Ali said after hearing growling, while Alexis heard the noise from herself. "You know what, I'm hungry, too. We can get clothes tomorrow." The girls decided to go with Ali's idea and look up their family history, but first they needed some food.

The sisters made their way to the kitchen, where Colette was eating a large chocolate cake. (Maids in LaBelle Castle were also inclined to be fat, and Colette was one of the larger maids there, outgrowing her uniforms somewhat rapidly.) "Hello, princesses, what's up?" "Hey, Colette, we need some info on our family tree," Alexis responded. "Yeah, and food!" Ali exclaimed. "Of course, anything for my princesses!" Colette accompanied the girls to the library with a cart filled with desserts, where they found books about the founding of New France.

Maura and Caroline noticed that many fields of Northern France, as well as some of the islands, remained desolate over a decade after the end of World War II, and President Charles de Gaulle was unable to fix the problem. Luckily the LaBelle family provided the wealth and resources to bring these areas back to life. Out of gratitude for their work, the family was given control of the areas they helped and formed the country of New France from them. "Hey, Alexis, who's Charles de Gaulle?" Ali asked. "He was a President of France. He didn't like having other countries help him out, so he must have really liked it when our family saved France," Alexis answered. Ali later found the recipe for the cake Colette was eating, called "Chocolate Miracle" by the creators, and wanted to make that and more with Alexis and Colette later.

All three girls would continue to stuff their faces with desserts as they read, and got stuck in their chairs when they finished, with their bellies spilling onto the table. Ali giggled as she moved her bloated body around. "Hee, hee, we're getting really fat!" Colette laughed at her statement. "Oh, girls, you're really getting into the LaBelle spirit!" Alexis was also pretty happy with how full she'd become, patting her belly after eating an entire Chocolate Miracle. "Yeah, I know, this is fun!" The sisters still needed to get out of the chairs if they were going to do other things that day, and it took some wriggling for them to get free. They spent the rest of the day admiring their growing bodies; Ali also looked over new recipes she wanted to make.

Tomorrow, Alexis and Ali would head into LaBelle City, the capital of New France, to get some new clothes.
12111122.title: Next Lesson: Baking and Fattening

121111221.content:
Jane entered Alexis' room the next morning and saw both her daughters lying contently on Alexis' bed. The girls always did have a pretty close bond, especially after their father died. Ali looked up to Alexis and the two girls did quite a lot together, though eating was only something Alexis truly enjoyed at first. They even styled their hair in the same pigtails: as a result, Ali often looked like a miniature Alexis. Jane couldn't help but smile at her girls and walked over to wake them for breakfast. She gave their bellies a couple of quick pats and the girls giggled themselves awake.

"Mom, that tickles!" Alexis was first to react. "You've never complained before," June replied. "Now come on, Colette and Marie are waiting with breakfast." (Marie and Colette are twins: they like to compete in eating contests with each other. Colette is 6 lbs. heavier, but Maria is just one win behind her in contests.) The princesses slowly walked down in their underwear, not bothering to get dressed after looking over their bodies last night. They just wanted to eat. They were greeted by the twin maids and loads of pastries that they consumed, taking the time to savor each bite. Marie whispered to Colette, "You were right, Colette, they are quite the big eaters." "They remind me of us just last week eating those cupcakes, Marie." Both maids helped escort the girls back to their rooms when they finished and helped them dress. Unlike other monarchies, New France royals didn't have specific dress codes or official attire, so the girls just wore regular clothes. However, Alexis had outgrown all her pants and some of her shirts and skirts, though she liked to hear the pops of her buttons and tears of her fabric. Ali had gotten too fat for pretty much anything, but she was perfectly fine waddling through town in her underwear.

"C'mon, Ali, you can't just go around the city like that!" Alexis found this rather amusing, but Marie piped up and said, "Actually, New France is rather lax when it comes to dress. She should be fine." Alexis was confused. "Here, we'll show you," Colette said as they left the room. They invited June to come along and the five ladies headed out into LaBelle City.

Just as Marie said, the dress code for the city was apparently non-existent. The girls there, all of whom were rather large, were proudly showing their engorged stomachs and in most cases, the princesses could easily notice their peek-a-boo panties, though this was nothing new to them as their maids' fat bodies provided the same exposure. In addition, skirts and dresses were the predominant forms of clothing seen on the ladies, except in the rare cases where they wore no clothing save their underwear, and food stores, mainly bakeries and pâtisseries, were everywhere. There wasn't much noise as they were busy eating this food, though light pinging and ripping could be heard as their clothes gave out.

"My goodness," Jane exclaimed, "These girls live so freely." "Remember, Your Highness, your mother did create this nation as a haven for larger women, and they have been given a large amount of freedom," Marie stated. "This is my kind of country!" Ali slapped her belly as a salute and made her way to a doughnut shop. Alexis caught up to her before she entered, though. "Hang on, Ali, first let's get some clothes, then we can eat." Colette directed them to a clothing store specializing in larger sizes, where the sisters stocked up on clothes to grow in. Alexis then chatted with the twin maids over eclairs, while Ali imagined what it'd be like to be fat enough to roll around while eating donuts with June. The princesses also had some rather interesting conversations with the local population, about how their country has been a utopia free of war and poverty due to their thriving economy. Alexis was especially taken by this and thought about how great her grandmother's country truly was. That is, when she wasn't thinking about how she was completely filled to the brim with pastries. In addition, she and Ali had both gained about 30 lbs. since arriving after weighing themselves (Alexis currently weighed 151 lbs., Ali 83 lbs.) Ali bumped bellies with Alexis as confirmation that she was loving her fat. Alexis bumped back and the girls had a friendly wrestling match before bed.

We rejoin the girls one month later on a trip to the island resorts of New France...
121111221.title: Lots to Love in LaBelle City

choices: Relax in a pool or jacuzzi
1211112212.content:
After spending enough time in New France, Alexis was inspired to share this great country's lifestyle with as many people as she could. She had eventually used her knowledge of New France's past and present to devise a way to spread the country's wealth and resources around the world, with Ali helping to determine which countries needed what. Though it was tiring work, they both felt that since the country was basically self-sustaining (the only one of its kind), it could distribute its wealth more readily than any other, and could do so within days given the efficient authority. (The family ruled over state and government since its formation.) As queen, Jane had to make the official call, but she realized Alexis' plan was sound and went ahead with it, and soon the world was beginning to reap the benefits after France and other members of the EU contributed to the plan. Within a month, even the poorest and least habitable countries had life and prosperity seeping in. Border disputes were becoming the few remaining conflicts in the world, and even those were fading.

The princesses, meanwhile, had worked quite hard in aiding the world, and were implored to take a vacation at a spa reserved for the Royal Family, La Grand Ventre (The Grand Belly). The girls had slowed in eating and gaining with their work, but the spa was stocked full of food to help them get back on track. Ali spent most of her time at the buffet, cooking and eating as much food as possible. The sounds of her eating, licking her fingers and patting her belly, now growing faster than ever, were prominent in the spa. Alexis also ate as much as she could and then some as often as possible, but usually from a pool or bath. Sometimes, it was just on her bed, and she loved to watch herself grow.

"Mmmph, Ali, dis ish good Bwioche!" Alexis' mouth was full of pastry was she complimented her sister in the kitchen. "I know, so's this cake!" Ali started shoving a vanilla cake into her own mouth. "I can teash you to bake it," she said with her mouth full. Alexis swallowed and said, "Sure, I've been meaning to get some of those recipes." (Ali was starting to teach Alexis how to bake when they arrived.) The girls got a bit tired of eating at that point, though, but weren't sure what to do next before weighing in: they needed time to digest first.

1212.content:
Alexis then looked at the three cakes her mom set before her. They were each three layers, wrapped in chocolate bars and bacon. Alexis wondered why she had to eat these. "Mom, why are you forcing me to eat so much?" Alexis asked. "All of the people of New France are fat," her mom explained. "Did I here you right. you say we must both get fat for societal norms," Alexis said. "Yes. In fact, as we are both quite thin for New France nobility, I imagine that arrangements will be made to make us more fitting for the role." Her mom explained. " The last few cakes I ate are not settling well with me, " her mom complained. "Perhaps some whole milk and soda will ease the pain," the limo driver suggested. "Yes. It should," her mom muttered. She then proceeded to chug an entire two liter bottle of soda.

Alexis, meanwhile, began to eat the three cakes. If I am going to be fat. I might as well enjoy it, she thought. She began by unwrapping the strips of bacon from each cake and eating each one individually, letting the flavor of the bacon linger on her tongue after each strip. Five minutes later, she began on the chocolate bars. Her stomach felt absolutely packed full of food. I can't eat any more, she thought. "Mom. I am legitimately stuffed," Alexis said. "I cannot physically fit any more in my belly," She continued. She rubbed her stomach for emphasis and burped. Her mom looked like she was about to have a major fit, but a royal advisor stopped her. "Rome was not built in a day. Her body will likewise not be made in a day. It will take time," he said. Her mom looked like she was going to argue, but in the end decided not to. The sadness was evident in her face when she said, "fine. You do not need to eat any more on the trip." "I will eat well at dinner," Alexis assured her. Alexis looked out the window of the limo, preparing herself for any administrative work that might be necessary at the castle.
1212.title: Alexis Keeps Eating

choices: A tour of the capital city
122.content:
The revelation that Kyra was the heir to the throne of New France was quite a shock to everyone - to Kyra herself, to her family, and even to the people of New France. Until that point, the little European kingdom had assumed that the current princess would, naturally, be crowned queen when her father died - however, a new investigation into the old records revealed that, hidden beneath a crease in the parchment, an entire other branch of the royal family had somehow been forgotten about over the centuries - and that, as a result, the new queen would have to be the oldest surviving member of that bloodline.

That oldest surviving member was Kyra. Before she even knew what was happening, she’d been bundled into a private jet and she was leaving her old life behind her, her little suburban town shrinking into nothingness behind her as the plane sped across the Atlantic towards New France. She hadn’t even had time to say goodbye to her friends at the orphanage, but she honestly barely cared – sans every single member of her extended family being killed in a freak barbeque explosion at a family reunion, this was the most exciting thing that had ever happened to her.

The seating on the plane was first class, naturally. She was seated at a table opposite an wizened, beleaguered-looking man who had introduced himself only as ‘your humble advisor’. As the land dropped away behind them he pushed a bowl of éclairs towards her and began to explain, as briefly as possible, what New France was like.

However, Kyra was barely listening – the only thing that really made her prick up her ears was when he said that the little kingdom had a strong culture of ‘consuming sweets’. Kyra was a big fan of candy, as evidenced by the now-empty bowl on the table – not that you’d be able to tell from looking at her. Her chestnut-brown hair framed a narrow face, and her top was baggy over a completely flat stomach and chest. Even with a bowl of éclairs inside of it, her stomach didn’t protrude an inch.

A few hours – and several éclair refills – later, the plane finally came in to land.
“Ah, yes – I forgot to mention,” the advisor said as they taxied towards the terminal, “We’ve arrange a little welcome ceremony for you as you get off the plane. Just smile, maybe wave if it seems appropriate – the people are anxious to see you!”

With anxious butterflies in her stomach (or perhaps it was just the many, many éclairs), Kyra waited for the door of the plane to open. She hoped there weren’t too many people out there…
And then the door opened, and she stepped out onto the stairs – and her eyes widened as she saw what looked like the entire population of New France waiting before her. A band started playing what she presumed was the national anthem as she began to descend onto the tarmac, and the crowd roared with delight. A carpet had been laid out before her, flanked on either side by girls about her age to provide a corridor down which she could walk, and as the music built they began to sing.
Eyes wide, she walked down the carpet, staring around at the grinning faces and singers on either side – then, remembering the advisor’s words, she did her best to smile. The crowd cheered with appreciation, and easing up a little she waved tentatively around at them which caused the cheers to swell even louder, almost drowning out the music.

Even amongst all the commotion and noise though, one thing about her subjects stood out to Kyra above all else – how incredibly fat they all were. She’d thought the entire population of New France was waiting on the runway, but on closer inspection many of them were just so large they took up the space of two or three people just on their own. On all sides there were round, flushed faces grinning at her, attached to fleshy necks that connected to massive bodies. She spotted a few slim-looking men, but of the women she saw every single one was huge.
Even the young choir girls flanking the carpet were huge. There were stood some distance apart, but their bellies swelled forwards so much that the space Kyra actually had to walk down was quite narrow. Even the girls years younger than her were enormous; their faces were bright red from the exertion of singing, and swollen potbellies strained the fabric of their dresses to the point where it looked like too deep a breath would probably set them bursting apart.

Eventually she got to the limousine at the end of the carpet and the smartly-dressed chauffeur held the door open for her to get in. She slid gratefully into the comfortable interior, and a moment later was joined by the advisor from the plane. Then they were away, the massive bustle of the welcoming ceremony fading into the distance behind her as they headed… somewhere.
“Um, excuse me? Where are we going?” she called forwards to the driver. As she waited for his answer, she popped a couple of candies into her mouth from a helpful little bowl on the table – did all transportation in New France come with free candy?
“My apologies, Your Majesty, I should have said,” the chauffeur replied, “We’re heading for…”
122.title: A Warm Welcome

1223.content:
“We’re heading for a welcoming feast at the city hall, in Petit Paris. That’s the nickname for the capital city here in New France,” the driver explained. Her advisor leaned to her.
“It’s customary in New France to have a feast to celebrate whenever there’s a special event. Birthdays, coronations, festivals, new moons, old moons, Sundays, eclipses – all such days warrant a feast.”
Kyra blinked, suddenly understanding.
“Oh, so that’s why everyone’s so fat?”

The advisor looked a little taken aback.
“Ah- well, it’s certainly a contributing factor…” he muttered, “I would advise you not to go throwing that word around though. People here can be touchy; mentioning someone’s weight, or especially implying that someone has gained weight, is a major faux-pas here.”
“Oh,” Kyra said, feeling a little uncomfortable, “I’ll, um, try not to do that I guess.”
“Well, you are the queen, Your Majesty – or at least you will be after your coronation next month. You may, of course, call people what you like; but maintaining your popularity with the upper class, at least, is vital to remaining in power,” her advisor hesitated, “There is, ah, a matter along those lines that I must discuss with you. I was planning on bringing it up later, but now is as good a time as any. It’s about the former heir to the throne, Princess Grace…”
He hesitated again and Kyra watched him curiously, chewing on yet another delicious candy, until he continued.
“Well, your discovery was not popular with everyone. Princess Grace was in line to be the next queen, and though she isn’t much loved by the public, she was at least a safe bet. You, Your Majesty, are a mystery, and you may find certain members of the elite – those who would have enjoyed the stability of Princess Grace on the throne – to be prejudiced against you.”
Kyra’s expression must have alarmed him, because he hastened quickly to continue.
“Don’t worry too much about it, Your Majesty – you are in no danger at all, do not panic. It’s just something worth keeping in mind.”

Kyra nodded, feeling a little overwhelmed. She popped a handful of candies into her mouth to distract her from all this news, and was a little dismayed to find that the bowl was now empty.

“I’d also refrain from having too much candy before the feast,” her advisor suggested, “It’s customary in New France to eat a lot at meals. In fact, failing to clear your plate is another major social embarrassment.”
Kyra smiled a little at this.
“Don’t worry, I can eat more than you’d think.”
“I have completely confidence in you,” her advisor nodded, “But it is worth bearing in mind.”
“Are there are other, um, flow-pass I should remember?” Kyra inquired.
“The expression is ‘faux-pas’, Your Majesty. Well – there are a fair few, actually. Always clean your plate at a feast; never mention someone’s weight; never mention the war; bring a gift to every occasion – usually some regional culinary delicacy, but your kitchens will deal with that so you needn’t worry; never admit that you’re full at a meal, that’s an insult to the chef. There are many more, but don’t worry – I will bring them up when they become appropriate,” her advisor assured her.

They were entering the city proper now, and Kyra looked out of the window at the people as they sped through the streets. Again, almost everyone she saw was incredibly overweight – especially the women. They stopped at a red light, and a woman crossed the road with two young girls trotting behind her. All three were massively overweight, their bodies bulging and wobbling as they made their way slowly across the road, sweat dripping down their faces from the exertion of walking. The red light seemed to take forever, and Kyra wondered if they were extra long to allow all the overweight people time to get across.

The advisor had been watching her stare at the obese family, and once the car had started moving again he gave a little sigh.
“I suppose I should probably explain our country’s, ah… ‘weight problem’,” he acknowledged, “Obesity in New France is spectacularly high – especially for women and young girls. The overall rate is 76 percent, but for women it is 91 – and for young girls, 99. It’s just in our culture to pamper women, and especially little girls, with treats and gifts at every occasion. The rate for men is a little under 50 percent; still extremely high, but not quite so bad due to a mandatory service in the armed forces for 18-21 year old males which ensures they stay slim for those few years at least.”
“Why not just introduce prescription for girls, too?” Kyra interjected, frowning.
“We tried, Your Majesty,” her advisor replied, “But by the time they’re eighteen, most girls are already so obese that the strenuous exercise of the army – not to mention the cost of housing and feeding them – was utterly prohibitive.”

There was a pause, then Kyra spoke.
“W-wait, did you say ninety-nine percent of girls are obese?” she stammered, suddenly processing the information.
“Yes, Your Majesty,” the advisor nodded gravely, “Ninety-nine point four percent, to be more accurate. Out of every two-hundred girls under the age of eighteen, perhaps two would be of a healthy weight. It’s a major medical concern for the nation.”

Kyra gaped. 99.4 percent! That was insane. Then again, if they had feasts as often as the advisor said they did, perhaps it was a little more understandable.
Before she could formulate a response, the limousine had slowed to a halt, and the driver was speaking.
“We’re here, Your Highness; the Town Hall. There’s a dressing room waiting inside for you, so that you can prepare for the feast. It is due to begin in two hours, so you have plenty of time to prepare.”

There was another crowd waiting outside as the door opened, and she did her best to smile and wave again before she was hurried into the building. She spotted a fair few slim men in the crowd as she passed, but of the women, she could only spot one who looked a pound under two-hundred. The advisor hadn’t been exaggerating.
Once she was inside the building, she was hastened straight to her dressing room. The advisor opened the door for her and she stumbled inside, almost colliding with…”
1223.title: An Expository Journey

124.content:
Amy looked at the limo that held her now, amazed by its luxury. Even in her wildest dreams as a child, she never thought she would be surrounded by such wealth. In fact, when she heard the news, she found it difficult to believe. It didn't help that the day she discovered she was a princess was April fools day. Her mind returned to that day.

" You are kidding. This is April fools day. This has got to be a tremendous joke." Wendy said. The formal looking man in front of her said, stone faced, "No. This is no joke. Your grandmother was indeed the princess of a country called New France. And has she died. This makes your mother the queen. And you a princess." "Tell me this is utter bull, mom. Please." Her mom was likewise very stone faced. Looking her daughter in the eye, she said, "No. This is indeed real." Here she paused to pull a sheet of parchment out and said, pointing. "You see. this is our family. This is your grandmother. This is me. Our royal lineage goes back generations." Confronted by this reality, Amy finally submitted. "Okay." She said. "I guess this means that I have to leave everything behind this instant." Another formal man said "You will finish this year. And New France will most likely not disappoint you. Our public education system is on par with nations like Finland. And our colleges like MIT. I have statistics to prove it."

And so it had gone. Amy had gotten her high school diploma, said her goodbyes to her friends, and was whisked off to New France. And now she was wondering why her mother was eating as much as she did. "Why are you eating so much mom?" she asked. "You will learn in time," came her cryptic response. And with that, Wendy settled back, enjoying as she did some of the new food offered to her. But not too much. A princess, from my understanding, should not be fat, she thought.but a girl has got to indulge every now and again. And I missed the triple size coffee I wanted when I got my diploma, she thought a moment later.

125.title: More girls

1251.content:
"Wow Tiff you're so fast!" squealed a fellow track member who had just witnessed Tiffany break a record.

"Indeed excellent work Tiffany." added her coach.

"Well I keep my body in perfect shape." gloated Tiffany as she flaunted her trim body savoring all of the praise from her peers.

After practice ended, Tiffany went into the locker room accompanied by her adoring friends. The girls chattered about as they changed out of their track clothes. As Tiffany undid her ponytail which restrained her long flowing hair, and remove her clothes she viewed herself and grew full with pride. Grazing her flat stomach with her slender fingers, proudly showing off her toned butt bereft of any such insecurity, and showing off a thin pair of legs. Tiffany frequently boasted of how essential a slender body was to a girl and enjoyed the similiar attitudes from the other girls. However Tiffany was strict with her diet and criticized other girls for any slightly poor eating choices.

"So Tiffany we're going to go grab a burger, wanna come?" asked a girl.

"Eww gross no way! Don't you know how bad that is. Seriously how can you expect to be flawlessly thin like me if you eat that garbage." Tiffany said.

"Well...I guess but it still sounds good so...I'm still going." answered the girl who walked to a group of girls.

"Hmphh your funeral." Tiffany said condescendingly.

Suddenly Tiffany received a text from her mother telling her to immediately come home. As Tiffany arrived at her house she noticed a rather fancy limo in her driveway. Upon entering the house Tiffany was greeted by the sight of her mother sitting down with a finely dressed man and overweight maid talking to her.

"Tiffany you're finally here!" exclaimed Tiffany's mother, Elizabeth.

"Mom whats going on?" Tiffany asked.

"Tiffany, you won't believe it! We're royalty!" squealed an ecstatic Elizabeth.

"It is true princess Tiffany, your mother and you and your sisters are now the royal family of our beloved New France." said the formal man.

"Here your highness we come bearing some of New France's finest pastries." said the fat maid.

"Oh well don't mind if I do." said Elizabeth grabbing a pastry along with her daughters even Tiffany despite her recalcitrant urge to stay thin.

Each woman's eyes light up as the exquisite pastry blessed their taste buds.

12511.content:
In the limo Tiffany and her family were greeted by platters and platters of food ranging from New Fra pastries to bags of fast food from down the street.

"Umm what is this?" asked a bewildered and slightly concerned Tiffany.

And we fine it very beneficial that Elizabeth is unmarried and still possesses 3 daughters for you see New France has always had a matriarchy and the people fiercely desire to keep it that way. However their is one dilemma for you see, to be blunt you and your family are far too thin for the taste of New France, especially the ladies. Women of New France pride themselves on their abundent flesh and being extraordinarily well fed." reported the refined man.

"So me and my daughters have to get fat?" Elizabeth said trying to grasp the situation.

"Indeed" the man simply answered.

After a pause Elizabeth positively replied. "Well being fats not so bad right girls, plus I think we'd all look pretty good fat." Elizabeth said reaching for more food.

The man and maid rejoiced.

"Wonderful you'll see that being fat it actually quite enjoyable milady." said the maid handing Elizabeth some cake.

"I refuse!" shouted Tiffany "No way am I getting fat!" barked the skinny blonde girl who crossed her arms in obstinate defiance.

"Come on your highness, I got some of New France's most scrumptous desserts here." enticed the maid.

As the queen decided, Tiffany looked out the window and saw girls eating burgers and couldn't help but feel a sickened from the irony.
125112.title: force

1251121.content: Elizabeth thought for a moment, the staff waiting with baited breath for her to make a decision “Let the maid do it. We must begin at once,” she said at last, grabbing a burger and biting into it. “Splendid,” the regal man said. “Then we shall begin at once,” He said, moving towards Tiffany. Tiffany tried to move away, but there was nowhere to go. His hands grabbed her arms and dragged her to the overweight maid. “You’ll never make me fat! Never!” she screamed, trying to break away. “You have no choice madam. You are still a dependent of you mother, and she wishes to be queen of New France. Being fat is a requirement for the position, and so fat you will become. You will become very fat,” he said. Forcing her down, he restrained her as the overweight maid positioned restraints such that Tiffany could not move. Tiffany forced her jaw shut. The maid forced it open and slid in a tube. A thick liquid flowed down the tube. If she could have, Tiffany would have gagged at how thick it was.I can only imagine how many calories this is, she thought. Almost as if reading her mind, the maid said “you will be pleased to know that this particular concoction contains close to eight thousand calories per liter. And you stomach can probably hold about two. At least at this moment. Your capacity will grow.”It’s even worse than I thought, Tiffany thought upon hearing this news. After what seemed like forever, the tube was removed from her throat. She was so full she did not notice the shocked look on the maid’s face, but she did notice her belly. Her feeder had clearly underestimated her capacity. What was supposed to be only one or two liters of eight thousand calorie shake was at least ten. Or twenty. Or possibly fifty. The toned track tummy she was accustomed to was now a mass that weighed more than she did, or at least that was how it seemed. She was so full she had trouble breathing. “You are truly royalty!” The maid shouted. “I don’t feel like it. I feel fat,” Tiffany muttered, barely able to breathe. “Nonsense! You are still quite skinny for a royal, but your stomach capacity proves you are royalty. Large capacities are a hallmark of the family, and your stomach has expanded to over one hundred and fifty times its original size. You aren’t as big as your family yet, but that is because you have devoted less time to growing in size than they have.” The maid responded. Looking over as best she could, she saw her mother and sisters were so full of food they made her look small in comparison. “Your next feedings will be in three hours,” the maid said. “If you are going to make me fat, can you please let me lie down. I wish to do so.” Tiffany muttered. “Of course princess, your wish is our command, unless it is to help you lose weight,” The regal man said. Making a gesture, two morbidly obese maids undid Tiffany’s restraints and moved her into a couch, where she lay. “Your next feeding will be in three hours,” one said. Tiffany wished to get away, or even be able to move, but the dozens of liters of shake prevented her from doing so. She also was slipping into a massive food coma. I will not get fat Tiffany thought. But deep down, she knew she had no other option.
1251121.title: The first force feeding

12511212.content: “Good morning princess, are you ready for your first breakfast.” Jamie said. Turning to her maid, Tiffany responded, “No.” “I’m sorry. There is no other option,” Jamie muttered, putting in an order to the kitchen for the first feeding of the day. Tiffany tried to move, but could not because she was chained. “You don’t need to feed me any more. I am fat.” Tiffany said. “You are still skinny, this is true. But you are less so than you were before,” Jamie responded. To say that Tiffany was less skinny than before would only be true in New France. By the standards of every other country, she was rather plump. In the first month, she had put on 150 pounds due to an extremely intense feeding regime. The toned track tummy was replaced with a huge hanging gut that covered her upper legs. She had had to forgo the clothing she brought with her in favor of voluminous dresses that allowed her room to grow.“What are you kidding, I’m fat,” Tiffany said. “You are not. You have much more weight to gain. You are expected to put on at least several hundred more pounds before the coronation. And It is my job to ensure you do.” “I can just lose...” Tiffany was interrupted by a tube being forced down her throat and the weight gain shake that followed soon after. She began sucking at the tube despite herself, finding she desired the taste. My god. What is happening to me. Just a month ago I was the fastest girl on my track team. Now I find myself drinking weight gain shake by the tens of gallons, and I think I am beginning to like it. Tiffany thought. Seeing her face, Jamie said “See. You are beginning to like this. You used to be repelled at the idea of gaining weight. Now have come to accept it. And then you will love it.” Tiffany watched as her stomach swelled up beyond what seemed humanly possible, watching as the number of liters declined. 100. 200. 300. At about 450 liters Tiffany began to feel full and struggle against her chains. “You can do better, princess. I know you can.” Jamie muttered, displeased. Tiffany watched in a mix of horror and fascination as her stomach continued to swell beyond it’s current state. At five hundred and seventy five liters, she began writhing furiously against her chains. “I suppose you have done well enough. Your next feeding will be in two hours, with more solid food this time. I will disconnect your feeding machine now,”Jamie said. “Thank you,” Tiffany said. “While you recover, your next lesson will be on the history of New France.”

An announcement came over the intercomm.“It is time for your first briefing as members of the royal family.” And they went.

Tiffany and her family sat down in the briefing room, where an obese maid sat in front of a power point projector with the first slide reading Welcome to the royal family. “Welcome to the royal family,” she said. “This first briefing is about the cultural traditions of New France.” She went to a slide that showed a morbidly obese woman being served by several attendants. “The primary tradition of New France is of royal obesity. Allison and her mother stepped into the expansive vehicle, almost immediately being greeted by a man in a fine suit. "Greetings madam, and madam. I apologize for the inconvenience, but our private aerial transportation has had a minor malfunction, so we've decided to take you on a more scenic route, if you don't mind, of course." He maintained a formal position as he spoke, his thick British accent only adding to his formality. He raised a thick eyebrow awaiting an answer. "Do you mind, Allison?", her mother asked, Allison quickly replying, "Of course not!" "It's decided! We'll take the scenic route." The butler revealed a grin under his mustache, "Right this way, then."

The inside of the vehicle was quite roomy, holding a restroom, a bar for sweets as well as alcohol, a TV, and some larger than usual leather benches. "How come the benches are so... big?", Allison let her curiosity get the best of her. "Well, to be honest madam, a couple of our previous rulers' wives were a little, shall you say, on the heavy side. These limos were specially designed to accommodate larger sizes" , the butler examined the fairly new benches, laying a gloved hand on one, "Recently, every female in such a high position has seemed to put on a significant amount of weight. It's quite odd, really." He stood back up and bowed, "Well, I don't want to hold you for too long. We best get going soon. Enjoy the ride." As the butler left, Allison's mind flooded with frightening thoughts of her becoming an obese whale like the others.

"Well, I guess this might be my answer to getting curves", Allison's mother joked, prompting Allison to half laugh. "Yeah...", Allison mumbled, thinking clearly the opposite of what her mom had in mind. Though, yes, she was already oddly blessed with a nice physique, she liked how curvy she was now. "I'm not going to let myself blow up", she whispered to herself, "at least not too much."

"Hey Allison, you want to try some of these sweets with me? I heard their country holds some amazing tastes." Did she really want to say no to her mother over sweets? She didn't want to miss bonding with her mom, but if she went over there, she would already be off to a bad start. What was a girl to do?

It should help", he spoke with a sense of urgency, and offered the pill once more. Without thought, Allison quickly took the pill and forced it down her mouth, in hopes of relieving the pain. I don't know what came over me, I was so irresponsible..." "No, it's fine lass. I should have warned ya beforehand. This all could have been avoided if I did", he shook his head, imagining how all of this could have been avoided, but this occurence made Allison more curious. "What was in that cake?"

          The man looked off in thought, thinking out his response, "Well, that type of cake has a lot of hard work and care put into it. A lot of it has to be prepared before you can even think of making it. They take the chocolate that goes into it and condense it, forming small high calorie chocolate pieces. The chef then has to go very carefully about containing it's condensed state while baking the cake, forming a very delicate yet elegant piece of art. The key part of the cake is that those particles tend to react to your stomach acid and expand, but with a small slice, it tends to go rather unnoticed. Some people even feel a slight delight at the feeling, but not with such a large portion!", he chuckled lightly, but his expression quickly returned to a more serious nature, "See, because of how much you ate, the acid in your stomach would not have been able to digest the bits before they fully expanded, so you would have blown up much larger than anyone I've ever seen. Some visitors and tourists take an extra slice or two because of dares or more nonsense, but they'd never eat as much as you have."

          Allison looked back and reexamined her body, shuddering at the thought of how bloated she could have been and blushing for not being able to control her appetite. As she looked at herself, she had one more question, "What was in the pill? How'd it manage to stop it so quickly?" "What was inside the capsule was a strong acid, so your body would be able to break down the cake at a much faster rate. The particles won't be able to expand if they're already digested. Though, the side effects aren't what a lass like you would hope for." She looked at him with concern. "Due to the extra acid, you'll be experiencing many more spouts of hunger until it wears and degrades. You might have the constant urge to eat until 3 to 5 days from now. Either that or we can find a just as powerful base to neutralize the acid. The choice is up to you."

          Allison pondered her options. The base might be good, but the medicine so far has seemed to produce some harsh side effects. But does she really want to put on so much weight in such a short time? She's already gained enough as it is.

"Oh and if you don't take the base now, I'm afraid you can't take it later."

Mt. Sunset’s peak laid bare; atop one of the highest mountains. It rested on an island, large enough to hold a small country. In addition to a few villages, a couple of forest ran through streams and river, Mt Sunset also held a relatively large town, with a couple dozens of thousands of inhabitants, and one of the largest, most well-preserved and yet modern castle in Asia.

Sunsetters themselves were basically Japanese in both looks and culture. They held great defiance to the “mainlanders”, mostly because of a souvenir of World War II, and the terrible occupation they brought along when the war started. However, most of them were very wealthy, because of loose banking law that brought many Japanese (and others) corporations into the country to do… let’s say, business. That, and tourism made the island very peaceful and wealthy.

The Imperial family was however still ruling. While it dealt with an elected prime minister for most daily affairs, the monarchy was still in power on Mount Sunset. Not that anyone complained, or wanted a system change of any sorts. After all, the overwhelming majority of inhabitants was well off and the imperial family had a tradition of benevolence to those that were not, and the reputation for honesty and balancing traditions with modernism.

The only problems were in difficult and tense relations between the island and Japan. Japan still claimed it as a territory, mostly because they didn’t like those corporations doing banking so close from their shore and yet so far from their taxes. There was also a bit of old imperialism left for some, and the constant reminding of atrocities commited during the war annoyed more than one. But, by balancing tradition and modernity so well, they also had the approval of many in the mainland (or main Islands) population.
An instance of such modernity was in the inheritance to the throne. The current aging emperor, Yoshimoto, had married late, mostly because he had never found a woman after his taste. Everyone expected his wild nephew to inherit the throne. But the Emperor finally found love, and had only one child; a daughter. As his reign was coming to a sunset (no puns intended), he changed the constitution to allow a woman to take the throne, a move that stunned many in Mount Sunset and abroad, then named his daughter sole heiress of the Imperial throne, and gave her the title of princess.

Mariko woke up. She laid in bed for a little while, enjoying the warmth of its sheets a little bit before getting up. Her schedule for the day was busy, and while she usually had the energy and the will to do it, this morning she was a little off. She had to had breakfast, then meeting with a tutor, on macroeconomics theories; then lunch with a Brazilian ambassador of Japan, the prime minister, then 2 hours practicing Arabic, her 6th and a half language (she didn’t quite got the hang of Russian quite yet), then half an hour working on her Russian. Then a small break, before heading into the government’s cabinet, to watch and learn the inner-working of the government. Then, she’d get to spend a little time with a friend of hers, before changing, and joining her father in an official meal to announce her new status as heiress to the throne.
But, meanwhile, a man was sitting still, looking at some papers, in a rather nice office. Another similar man entered the room, eager to speak:
“Operation Dinnertime snack is officially ready to go. Our agent is in place, about to be active”

“Excellent. Proceed as planned”

“Yessir” said the second man, quickly leaving. Much had to be done
“So. Now, we ruin that brat’s figure. Then her standing and appeal are gone, and the Emperor is dishonered”

The day went by without an hitch, as most days in the Imperial households did. Mariko went to bed, exhausted. Luckily, she had been granted by her father after dinner a much looser schedule. Indeed, other than the weekly ministerial meetings, the daily language classes, and the important national occasions, she was not to leave the palace or appear in public, according to the tradition. That meant that trips to the neighbouring countries for diplomatical purposes, meeting with foreign dignitaries or regular trips among the general population were over for her. She was rather to spend time with the rather small, but still important nobility; a part of her preparation that had been rather neglected up until now.

Mariko was very happy to hear that. It would give her time to read more about more topics, something she hadn’t been able to do since she had become a potential heiress. Furthermore, she was mentally and physically exhausted by all her duties. Her father also gave her a few days off, without any duties or lessons, a time where she was actually prohibited by her father to do any learning.

And so, the next day, she woke up unusually late. But she didn’t care, as she laid in her bed, a big grin on her face. She could so get used to this. Her lady-in-waiting waited until she got up, before going in

“Milady, please, by an order of the Ministor of the Interior” (The one in charge of the Imperial Household and Nobility) “I’ve brought you your breakfast in bed”
Mariko gazed upon the meal: a large assortment of Japanese treats, as well as French toasts drenched in maple syrup; eggs and bacon.


“Please, Mitsuki! I cannot be expected to eat all of this!”

“Awww… Milady, do not worry. I shall dispose of the rest of your meal after you are done”

But, as it turns out she didn’t have to. Mariko sat in her bed, the tray with her huge meal, and dug in as she watched some shows on her computer. She didn’t notice that she had finished her meal, until her hand reached for some bacon slice to find nothing. At which point, her stomach started to hurt; she had stuffed herself without even noticing it! Her belly was seemingly poking out. Mariko started to slowly massage it, trying to relieve the pain. She did that slow, enjoying her gentle touch on her stretched out belly. Still, though she kinda enjoyed this, and the meal had been excellent, she was worried. “I must work this off soon!” But, before she could get up, she started to feel extremely tired. Still in her bed, she fell back, and slept some more.

Meanwhile, someone was standing in the corridor next to Mariko’s large room. As the figure watched through the slightly opened door, it noticed that the drugs put in the Orange juice had worked just fine. Now, Mariko would sleep for the next few hours, and feel groggy for even longer than that. By the evening, she’d be hungry too, hopefully. But, as Mariko laid, alone, the figure decided also to place various snacks. By the end, they were hidden everywhere; even in her bed. Princess Mariko would therefore be surrounded in her rooms by many, many edibles of all sorts.

When she wakes up…

141122121.content:
Mariko did not wish to adress the nation in person, so she decided to write a press release apologizing for the trouble that had settled in the nation because of her lapse in willpower, and announced her resolve to lose her weight. She was still feeling ashamed over her figure; she did not want to be seen in public like this. It was bad enough that Mitsuki, and now Ben, got to see her like that. Luckily, neither of them seemed to care. In fact, her lady-in-waiting had gone as far as removing all the mirrors from the princess’ quarters, so that she could not see her frame very clearly.

Meanwhile, Ben continued his frequent visit to the princess. He had noticed the changes in her figures, of course. And every time he noticed how a piece of clothing was tight on Mariko’s curves, he was reminded of that first magical night, when he had spotted her leaving the kitchen, with a wee-bit large handful of donuts. On the other hand, he kept being the perfect friend, supporting Mariko in her endeavors. But Ben wasn’t the only one fascinated with the changes in Mariko’s body; Mitsuki was doing her best to make sure her mistress’ weight would remain the same. Or increase.

Mariko did try to diet. She had a bunch of gym equipment set up in her chambers. Unfortunately, after a couple of days of full workout, the machines just broke one after the other. Mariko was actually relieved: she hated working out. And so, she decided that she wouldn’t use her remaining machine, until she had at either gotten her weight under control, or as last resort. Also, she tried to get her eating under control. So she reduced her meals. But, she didn’t stop watching TV or reading her books; in addition to those habits, she was used to snack, and that did not change. She did instruct Mitsuki to not let any more snacks inside her place. But, after a few days, Mitsuki, after being advised by a friend of hers, decided to reintroduce snacks little by little. Mariko barely noticed that; she kept eating once again.

After a couple of weeks, she sat on her bed, alone, in her underwear, ready to get in her pyjamas. She noticed her belly was bigger than before; she could not longer hold it with her two hands. Her lap were bigger; she could see marks on her hips. Her boobs, on the other hand were also bigger; she had gone up at least a little a cup. Suddendly, she heard someone opening the door to her room; it was…
141122121.title: ...that she wanted to lose weight!

1411221212.content:
Ben. The two of them were supposed to watch movies that evening, and Ben would sleep on the couch. Mariko was utterly embarrassed again; it was the second time that Ben had caught her in an embarrassing situation. Not only was she practically naked; in bra and panties. She was also at the time squishing her potbelly. She had never been seen like this (except by her household staff, of course), much less by a boy. But, in the midst of this humiliation, she felt a strange rush. Not a bad one. It was similar to what she had felt the first time she had met Ben, but in a stronger, more penetrating fashion.

Poor Ben also felt the same way he had felt the first time; he could not help but stare, and gaze at the sight in front of him, while being scared witless. He wished he could disappear in a hole, never to be seen again; he expected his head to be cut off for this. But at the same time; Mariko was a princess, and in Ben’s eyes, she had the body to match this. He quietly left, hoping to never be in such a situation again.

After a few seconds, longer than both of them expected but sooner than the both of them really wanted, Ben withdrew from his friend's room. He just went back in front of the TV, where a DVD of a movie Mariko had wanted to see for a while was waiting for them. They watched the movie in complete silence; the awkwardness was so heavy it could be cut with a knife. Once the movie was over however, Ben finally mustered his courage to speak up

“Look, princess… I… well… look, I am sorry for earlier”

“Ben… let’s just… not talk about this, okay?”

“I just don’t wanna things to be weird between us from now on?”

Mariko just stayed silent. They had an awkward conversation after a while, until Mariko went to her chambers. She wept a little bit, still ashamed that she had been seen like this by a boy that she cared so much about. She grabbed a few skittles, donuts and other candies. Meanwhile, there was the mysterious figure again; it was watching Mariko through various hidden cameras. The plan was working just like a charm; the country was in disarray, the princess was losing popularity and self-confidence as she remained more and more away from the public, and she was getting hooked on an indolent and lazy lifestyle; one unbefitting a princess.
1411221212.title: Ben?!

choices: A public event forces Mariko out of her isolation
There's more to Ben's disappearance than Mariko knows.
14112212122.content:
A month had passed and Mariko had not seen much of Ben. He had been by once or twice, but things had been uncomfortable between them. It had been weeks since she last saw him. She was starting to worry. Where was he? Why hadn't he come? What if he would never visit her again? What if her weight had turned him off? Maybe he thought her a fat lazy pig.
She knew it was a silly thought, but she couldn't get it out of her head. She couldn't stop thinking about him. She tried to distract herself with work, but it was no use.
She felt so isolated. She had no one to talk to, no one to or rely on, no one who would treat her as an equal. As if she was just a normal girl. All she had was her duties. And they just didn't seem enough anymore.
She found herself turning to food for comfort. Food didn't judge her, it didn't expect or require anything of her.
Mariko was eating more than ever. She would lock herself away with only Mitsuki, her lady in waiting, there to keep her company and attend to her needs. Once alone and away from the judgemental gaze of her subjects Mariko would binge.
She would spend whole days in bed, shovelling down snacks and eating her way through the food that Mitsuki brought her.
Mitsuki knew that the princess’s habits were bad, both for her and the kingdom. But she couldn't find it in her heart to object. Secretly she rather liked having the princess all to herself. She like taking care of her and keeping her fed. To be perfectly honest, she liked to see her mistress fill out.
And Mariko most certainly had filled out. The slender, delicate princess the people had known was no more. The latest month had put another 25 pounds on her figure. Most had found their way to her bulging belly, but her entire body had filled out. Her beautiful face had softened, turning round and cherubic. She had developed an unmistakeable double chin.
Mitsuki put another bowl of snacks down beside her mistress.
"Here you are my lady."
"Thank you Mitsuki." The overfed princess smiled at her. "I don't know what I'd do without you.
Mitsuki could feel her face redden as her mistress eagerly popped another several sweets into her mouth.
"There was another thing my lady."
"What?" Mariko asked between bites.
"Well... one of the councillors wanted you to look at this report."
"Can't it wait a little?" Mariko said, her eyes pleading Mitsuki to agree.
Mitsuki nodded.
"As you wish, my lady."
She put the papers away and watched as Mariko went back to grazing on her snacks.
From Behind his monitor the man in the shadows chuckled. This was just too pefect. The fair dutiful princess Mariko was turning into a lazy, bloated recluse right in front of his eyes.

info.description:
Follow a girl as she gains weight in a fictional modern day kingdom. Be fun and creative.
Rules
-No male weight gain
-No people over the age of 32 should gain
-No "weight gain darts"
-No potions or elixirs
-No rapid weight gain (Ex: gaining 5,000 lbs in one day, remember to keek the gain steady and consistent)
-No magic
-No ray guns
-No rape
-No killing off the characters
-No ending the story (keep in long)
-For goodness sake, use correct grammar, spelling, and NO run-on sentences (It's not that hard people!)
-Sex and nudity is allowed, but don't make it for extended periods of time, and don't go in detail about it.
-Keep Chapters long
